mapper.select: select mbgl.xh,mbgl.jcxmid,mbgl.hbid,mbgl.jczxmid,mbgl.bgmbid,jcxm.csmc jcxmmc, jczxm.csmc jczxmmc,bgmb.csmc bgmbmc,mbgl.bgmbid2,bgmb.csmc bgmbmc2 from igams_hbbgmbgl mbgl left join matridx_jcsj jcxm on jcxm.csid=mbgl.jcxmid left join matridx_jcsj jczxm on jczxm.csid=mbgl.jczxmid left join matridx_jcsj bgmb on bgmb.csid=mbgl.bgmbid left join matridx_jcsj bgmb2 on bgmb2.csid=mbgl.bgmbid2 where mbgl.hbid=#{hbid} order by mbgl.xh asc
